wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Sir Sebastian John Lechmere Roberts,  (born 1954) is a retired senior British Army officer who served as the Senior Army Representative at the Royal College of Defence Studies.

response: *Major General Sir Sebastian Roberts KCVO OBE – appointed 17 March 2008.
* Sebastian Roberts (1954–), Senior Army Representative at the Royal College of Defence Studies.
*Major-General Sir Sebastian Roberts,  2003–2007 late Irish Guards

However, it was not until 2000 that the Army published 'Soldiering – the Military Covenant', setting out the obligations on the soldier to make personal sacrifices in the service of the nation, and stated that the armed forces must be sustained by the nation. The code had been drafted over the course of three years by senior officers led by a Brigadier.. The main author was Major-General Sebastian Roberts..
Military Experts: Julian Thompson and Sebastian Roberts
